name: Hellmazon
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #40

Didn't had a lot of time this weekend to make this as my baby daughter was a bit sick and demanding.
So this is merely a prototype, I dunno if I'll turn it into something more, will see.

Welcome to Hellmazon, grand distribution means you'll never be fast enough.
Use WASD keys and the mouse to please capitalism.
